name: AcuteInpatient
title: Acute Inpatient
description:
**Using UMLS code system as proxy for UBREV codes.
**
This value set created for the purpose of identifying an acute inpatient stay for use in MSSP ACO readmission or preventable admission measures.

Please note that use of this value set is not limited to MSSP ACO measures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set created for the purpose of identifying an acute inpatient stay for use in MSSP ACO readmission or preventable admission measures.),(Data Element Scope: ClaimProcedure, ClaimItem.service, ClaimItem.revenue, Encounter.hospitalization, Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Acute inpatient stay via procedure or revenue billing codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-acute inpatient stay)
